name: Bunner Gunner
description:
Our spacefaring heroine finds herself stuck on the surface of the hostile planet Jupiter. She’s been cursed by the planet itself to endure an endless cycle of death and rebirth that happens every 10 seconds. However, even a curse has a silver living - while visiting the underworld, she is able to retrieve the lost souls of her lovers. In order for the curse to be broken, you’ll have to cut through swarms of dangerous foes and eventually take it up with Jupiter itself - good luck!

Game made for Ludum Dare 51 (scored 358th overall). Theme was "Every 10 Seconds".  Apologies for the lack of sound, inability to pause, and no mobile support.

Credits:
Linatic (me): artwork, planning
piscythe: code, planning
